About Me

My name is Klejvi and I am a Software Engineering student currently studying in one of the best Universities in my country. I am a self taught Angular Developer and been working on that for the past 2 years. I am also well versed on C, Java, JavaScript and recently I'm into Dart (Flutter). I am quite good at handling projects and my strongest point is that I am able to work under pressure. Whether time pressure or let's say not the appropriate behaviour.
